nodes.excerpt: The simplest way to optimize your DeFi investment. Take advantage of pre-built DeFi strategies in just one platform. Deposit, borrow, transfer, buy, leverage and more - all in one place.
nodes.title: ChainRunner Q - All DeFi in one place

nodes.excerpt: An online tool that makes it easy to generate fluid and organic-feeling gradients, then export them as lightweight SVG files to be used as backgrounds in your designs.

nodes.title: Webflow TV - Inspiring stories of creativity and ingenuity
nodes.author: Mischa Vaughn

nodes.excerpt: Fable is motion design software for the next generation of creators that's powerful for pros, intuitive for beginners, and collaborative for teams. Start animating with Fable and we can't wait to welcome you into our community.
nodes.title: Fable - The web-based motion design platform
nodes.author: Chris Boardman

nodes.excerpt: Customizable personal email newsletter created from your favorite sources. The simplest way to follow the news across the web.
nodes.title: Taco Digest - The best email newsletter created by you
nodes.author: Dmitrii Pashutskii

nodes.excerpt: Enhance your Wikipedia experience with a beautiful, clean, modern design that's fully customizable. Once installed, this free extension will simply apply the new look and features to existing Wikipedia article pages, without you having to do anything.
nodes.title: Modern for Wikipedia - A beautiful, clean, modern web UI for Wikipedia
nodes.author: Steve Wildman

nodes.excerpt: Every two weeks, we break down a website and write a short case study showing how to personalize the customer experience.
nodes.title: Personalization Decoded - Short case studies showing the true personalization
nodes.author: Esat Artug

nodes.excerpt: Your competitor isn't designing those images by hand. They're generating them via platforms like Previewify. They save more time and have a bigger conversion rate.
nodes.title: Previewify - Automated social previews for your site
nodes.author: Dennis Smink

nodes.excerpt: Texta.ai is a Pro Article Writer that automatically generates and optimizes articles. Save yourself 90% of your time by letting a powerful system create outstanding articles (1500-2000 words) from a simple description.
nodes.title: Pro Article Writer - Write outstanding articles in seconds
nodes.author: Arman Maksat

nodes.excerpt: No-code showcase featuring selected projects built by Heep makers. Discover apps, websites, and automation created using low-code, no-code, and automation tools. A little experiment from our team built with the new Bubble responsive engine.
nodes.title: No-code Showcase by Heep - 200+ selected projects built without code
nodes.author: edmund amoye
